text: Michelle Hinchey (born November 3, 1987) is an American politician. She is a Democrat from New York State. In the 2020 New York State Senate election, Hinchey won with a margin of 51-49%. She took the office in January 2021. Hinchey was born in Saugerties, New York. Her father was U.S. Representative Maurice Hinchey. After Congressman Antonio Delgado was picked as lieutenant governor of New York in May 2022, Hinchey was mentioned as a possible candidate in a special election to fill his vacant House seat. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States
title: Michelle Hinchey
